CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 17, 1966, pg. 7B reads: "Admire New Kitchen Facilities - The most recent improvement in the course of progress at Central Baptist Church, Wylie Ave. and Kirkpatrick St., is the gleaming new $1500, stainless steel kitchen, which was formally dedicated Sunday, Sept. 4. The pastor, Dr. Isaac Green, left, and representative leaders of the church are checking over the Steam Table, which is the last word in efficiency and beauty.  Continuing left, others in the picture are, Mrs. Edith Venable, chairman of the board of Christian Education; Miss Delaine Crump, representing the youth and Charles P. Pernell, chairman of the trustee board. (Harris Photo)
TitMainTitle: Rev. Isaac Green and Charles Pernell, standing in new stainless steel kitchen installed in Central Baptist Church
